ai-tha-ap561:2.2_0: I flew to alms from alms.
ai-tha-ap561:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap561:2.4_0: This is the fruit for you.
ai-tha-ap561:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap561:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap561:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sivaka.
ai-tha-ap561:7.1_0: the ninth senior mendicant with its ninety.
